    Load data for a particular pathogen

    load_data.Rd

    Load data for a particular pathogen

    Usage

    load_data(table_type = NA, pathogen = NA, vignette_prepend = "")

    Arguments

    table_type

    which type of table (either article, parameter, outbreak, model) should be loaded

    pathogen

    name of pathogen

    Value

    return data for table_type and pathogen

    Examples

    load_data("outbreak","marburg")
#> Rows: 23 Columns: 20
#> ── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> Delimiter: ","
#> chr  (5): outbreak_start_month, outbreak_end_month, outbreak_country, outbre...
